text: Miryam Lumpini is a Swedish-born tattoo artist and painter. ==Early life== Lumpini was born on 3 December 1993 in Stockholm, Sweden to a Swedish mother and Congolese father. She was raised in the remote countryside of Gothenburg by her single mother.https://youtube.com/nlEj-3crclQ ==Career== Lumpini moved to Los Angeles, California in 2012 to pursue a tattooing career after studying graphic design. She started tattooing as an amateur while in high school. She calls herself “The Witch Doctor”. She has been praised for her use of color. Notable clients Lumpini has tattooed include Jhené Aiko, Skrillex, and Swae Lee. Lumpini designed a shoe for Reebok. == References == Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish women painters Category:Artists from Stockholm Category:Tattoo artists Category:Artists from Los Angeles Category:People from Gothenburg Category:Swedish expatriates in the United States Category:21st-century women artists
title: Miryam Lumpini
